name: Robivity
description:
Entry for the 2022 Epic MegaJam

An action platformer with a stylized cyberpunk aesthetic that allows the player to use gravity based powers to launch enemies, slow projectiles or launch themselves.

Controls:

Keyboard & Mouse:

A: Move Left
D: Move Right
Space bar: Jump
Left Mouse: Attack (hold to charge)
Right Mouse: Super (hold to charge)
Mouse 4: Dash

GamePad:

Left Thumbstick or D-Pad: Move Left/Right
A Button: Jump
X Button: Attack (hold to charge)
Y Button/Right Trigger: Super (hold to charge)
B Button/Left Trigger: Dash

Made in UE5, however Lumen is not enabled

Sourced Assets:
https://quaternius.com/packs/cyberpunkgamekit.html - Meshes used, materials replaced, bar sign images.
https://ansimuz.itch.io/cyberpunk-street-environment - Sprite backgrounds.
